response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that such a unique item finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates its true worth and can utilize it to its fullest potential. I look forward to discussing the details with you and hope to facilitate this transaction that benefits us both. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
